sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Weathercard = ({tempInfo}) => { const {temp, humidity, weathermood, pressure, name, speed, country, sunset} = tempInfo //converting the seconds into time let sec = sunset let date = new Date(sec*1000) let timeStr = `${date.getHours()}:${date.getMinutes()}` return ( <> {/*our temp card*/}
{temp}°
sunny
{name},{country}
{new Date().toLocaleString()}
{/*our 4 section column*/}

{timeStr}
Sunset

{humidity}
Humidity

Pressure
{pressure}

Speed
{speed}

) } export default Weathercard
